actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the exclusion from gross income for qualified scholarships shall include scholarships received for travel, research, and living expenses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income scholarship amounts used for a student's travel, research, and living expenses, including room and board, while attending school away from home.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the exclusion from gross income for qualified scholarships shall include scholarships received for travel, research, and living expenses.
